languages.text: [Направить оружие на сержанта] "Брось оружие, слуга, не то прикончу, как бешеного пса!"
[Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"
languages.original_text: [Направить оружие на сержанта] "Брось оружие, слуга, не то прикончу, как бешеного пса!"

traits.locale_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

languages.text: [Deine Waffe auf den Sergeant richten] "Ihr senkt Eure Waffe, Sergeant, oder ich töte Euch wie einen tollwütigen Hund!"
languages.original_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

traits.locale_text: [Deine Waffe auf den Sergeant richten] "Ihr senkt Eure Waffe, Sergeant, oder ich töte Euch wie einen tollwütigen Hund!"

languages.text: [Pointer votre arme sur le sergent] « Lâchez votre arme, minable... Sinon je vous abats comme un chien. »
languages.original_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

traits.locale_text: [Pointer votre arme sur le sergent] « Lâchez votre arme, minable... Sinon je vous abats comme un chien. »

languages.text: [举起武器，对准军士]“放下武器，下仆，否则我就像扑杀疯狗一样杀了你！”
languages.original_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

traits.locale_text: [举起武器，对准军士]“放下武器，下仆，否则我就像扑杀疯狗一样杀了你！”

languages.text: [軍曹に武器を向ける]「従者よ、武器を捨てよ！さもなくば狂犬のように殺すぞ！」
languages.original_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

traits.locale_text: [軍曹に武器を向ける] 「従者よ、武器を捨てよ！ さもなくば狂犬のように殺すぞ！」

languages.text: [Apuntar al sargento con el arma] «¡Suelta el arma, sirviente, o acabaré contigo como con un perro rabioso!».
languages.original_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

traits.locale_text: [Apuntar al sargento con el arma] «¡Suelta el arma, sirviente, o acabaré contigo como con un perro rabioso!».

languages.text: [Silahını çavuşa doğrult] "Silahını bırak asker. Yoksa şuracıkta kuduz köpek gibi geberirsin!"
languages.original_text: [Point your weapon at the sergeant] "You will drop your weapon, servant, or I will end you like a rabid dog!"

traits.locale_text: [Silahını çavuşa doğrult] "Silahını bırak asker. Yoksa seni kuduz köpekmişçesine gebertirim!"
